info.title: eNanoMapper database

externalDocs.description: More information about the Nano safety data

tags.description: Multi-DB aggregated free text and faceted search

tags.name: Studies

tags.name: Data analysis

parameters.description: Search parameter, UUID of the investigation or a substance
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Search parameter, InChI key(s) of the substance component(s), comma delimited
parameters.name: inchikey

parameters.description: Search parameter, chemical structure or substance identifier(s), comma delimited
parameters.name: id

externalDocs.description: Learn more about operations provided by this API.

parameters.description: Compound identifier (SMILES, InChI, name, registry identifiers)
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Base64 encoded mol file; if included, will be used instead of the 'search' parameter
parameters.name: b64search

parameters.description: Ontology URI to define groups of columns
parameters.name: sameas

parameters.description: Compound identifier (SMILES, InChI, name, registry identifiers)
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Base64 encoded mol file; if included, will be used instead of the 'search' parameter
parameters.name: b64search

parameters.description: Defines the expected content of the search parameter
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Restrict the search within the AMBIT dataset specified with the URI
parameters.name: dataset_uri

parameters.description: Restrict the search within the set of structures with assigned substances
parameters.name: filterBySubstance

parameters.description: If the structure is used in the specified bundle URI, the selection tag will be returned
parameters.name: bundle_uri

parameters.description: Ontology URI to define groups of columns
parameters.name: sameas

parameters.description: Only for application/json; to include mol as JSON field
parameters.name: mol

get.description: Returns compounds with the specified substructure

parameters.description: Compound identifier (SMILES, InChI, name, registry identifiers)

parameters.name: b64search

parameters.description: Defines the expected content of the search parameter
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Restrict the search within the AMBIT dataset specified with the URI
parameters.name: dataset_uri

parameters.description: Endpoint category (The value in the protocol.category.code field)
parameters.name: category

get.description: Returns a list of substances, according to the search criteria

parameters.description: If type=related finds all substances containing this compound; if typ =reference - finds all substances with this compound as reference structure
parameters.name: compound_uri

parameters.description: Retrieves if selected in this bundle
parameters.name: bundle_uri

parameters.description: Adds a compound record as substance in JSON; only if type=related
parameters.name: addDummySubstance

parameters.description: If true retrieves study summary for each substance
parameters.name: studysummary

parameters.description: true (Show all compositions) false (do not show hidden compositions)
parameters.name: all

get.summary: Get substance composition as a dataset

parameters.description: Endpoint category (The value in the protocol.category.code field)
parameters.name: category

parameters.description: Investigation UUID, a code to link different studies
parameters.name: investigation_uuid

parameters.description: Endpoint category (The value in the protocol.category.code field)
parameters.name: category

parameters.description: If true will group by topcategory,endpointcategory,interpretation result
parameters.name: result

get.summary: Get study summary for the substance

/select.description: Apache Solr powered search for Nanosafety data

get.description: GET is simpler to use, but imposes restrictions on the complexity and the lenght of the parameters.

post.description: POST is more complex to use, but also allows for much for complex and lengthy queries.

QueryBody.description: a JSON object with Solr query parameters
